aka: The Little Bird and the Leaf

director.name: 莉娜·冯·多伦 Lena von Döhren

this_title: Der kleine Vogel und das Blatt
trans_title: The Little Bird and the Leaf
introduction: It’s winter. At the end of a branch hangs a single leaf. A little black bird comes along to water the leaf, but it falls off. The wind lifts the leaf and dances with it through the snowy wood. The little bird joins in, delighted. But the fiery red fox behind the tree is already licking his lips.
foreign_title: Der kleine Vogel und das Blatt
